Key Match Events: The match between India and Canada was abandoned due to a wet outfield.
There was no rain on the day of the match, but heavy showers over the past two days had damaged the field.
India finished as table-toppers with seven points, while Canada finished with three points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was scheduled to be played in Florida.
The game between USA and Ireland was also washed off the previous day due to stormy weather in Florida.
India's fielding coach T Dilip praised Rishabh Pant for his performance since his return to international cricket after a life-threatening road accident.
